QuestData.Title: The Value of Knowledge
QuestData.Description:
This crate is filled with relics from the nearby ruins. The pirates have discarded them, likely thinking they're of little value.
The Explorer's League would probably appreciate if you retrieved these relics for them to study.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 7 Crates of Ancient Relics from the waters outside Dreyrgrot.
QuestData.RewardText: Well that was most noble of you to save these ancient relics from a water-logged fate.$B$BI will be sure that the Explorer's League puts these to good use!
